subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams advanced to the final at the Hansol Korea Open in Seoul by defeating Flavia Pennetta of Italy in straight sets. The top-seeded Williams will face fourth-seeded Maria Kirilenko in the final. Williams beat the unseeded Pennetta, 6-2, 6-2. Kirilenko defeated fifth-seeded Eleni Daniilidou, 7-5, 6-0.
